data.description: Bindings for the Gnome 2.x UI Toolkit
data.communities:
gtk-perl-list@gnome.org, #gtk-perl on ircd.gimp.org,
    http://gtk2-perl.sourceforge.net/ (news, rels, doc, tutorials, cvs,
    etc.)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
(bascially the same as Gtk2)

    Gnome was the original namespace of the bindings for gnome 1.x.
    Both Gnome and Gnome2 are will often will need to co-exist on
    systems.

    The Gtk2-Perl set of modules are part of the official Gnome
    Language Bindings set which requires adhereance to a set of rules
    about api stability and release numbering. The bindings are pretty
    complete (api-wise) as are the tests.
